body.p: For the following reasons, the Board decided that the 2018 Conceptual Framework should not refer explicitly to the business activity of long-term investment:

li.p: referring explicitly to any particular business activity would, inappropriately, embed excessive detail in the Conceptual Framework; and
the Conceptual Framework does not refer to any other business activity.
